docs.snippet: President Trump hoped to devote proceeds from repealing a health care mandate to helping the rich. Then came Ivanka Trump and Republican senators with other ideas.

headline.print_headline: President’s Daughter Joined Senators to Halt Rate Cut for the Richest
headline.main: Trump Wanted a Bigger Tax Cut for the Rich, Ivanka Went Elsewhere

docs.snippet: “There may be emotional safety in talking about your story at a physical remove from where it unfolded. But it is far more enlightening — and personally rewarding — to be there.”

headline.print_headline: Where a Reporter Fears to Tread
headline.main: Clearing the Air on Climate Education: A Reporter Returns to the Scene of Her Story

docs.snippet: The case, involving accusations of the misuse of some $100,000 in public funds, is one of four corruption investigations closing in on Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

docs.snippet: The Italian holiday bread is revered among serious bread bakers for its extraordinary texture and flavor, but getting it right is a challenge.

headline.print_headline: It’s an Italian Bread, and a Challenge
headline.main: Panettone Has Become an Obsession for American Bakers

docs.snippet: Alex Jones called the Sandy Hook Elementary killings a hoax and the Sept. 11 attacks an inside job. Now he’s concocting new theories on the mass shooting in Las Vegas.

headline.main: Las Vegas Massacre Gives InfoWars More Conspiracy Fodder

docs.snippet: Tuesday: Meditation tips for a stressful time of year, free ice skating and the library’s top books for kids.

docs.snippet: Two decades ago, big companies wagered that they could save billions by shifting profits overseas. Under Republican tax plans, those bets would pay off.

headline.print_headline: Big Rewards for Corporations That Moved Money Offshore
headline.main: How Tax Bills Would Reward Companies That Moved Money Offshore

docs.snippet: Chopped up fresh figs and a honeyed cream cheese frosting make this cake perfect for Rosh Hashana and beyond.

docs.snippet: Shove over, silver foxes! Cloud pharmacies will save millennial men from shame, sending trendy boxes of Viagra and hair-loss cures direct to home.

headline.print_headline: Marketing Viagra Without Walks on the Beach

docs.snippet: Decades before the trials in Massachusetts, women in Connecticut were being accused. Now, a group of people there is moving to clear the names of the victims.

headline.print_headline: The First Witch Trials Were in Connecticut, Years Before Salem
headline.main: Where Was the First Woman Condemned for Witchcraft? Not in Salem
